Package com.generalnegentropics.archis.universe.environmentalconditions

Interface Summary
Landscape2DObserver Interface for a class cabable of observing movements on a Landscape2D
 

Class Summary
EnvironmentalMutationCondition A condition that causes random mutations to living cells
GenesisCondition A condition to induce genesis in an empty universe containing no life.
GPReproductionCondition An environmental condition that artificially reproduces cells based on their points earned.
Landscape2D Implements a two-dimensional landscape with cell-cell interaction.
Landscape2D.Landscape2DCellMetaInfo Data structure stored as cell meta-info for landscape
Landscape2D.XYLocation Represents an X,Y location in the landscape
LifespanCondition Kills cells after a specified age is reached
RandomDeathCondition A condition that randomly kills cells
RandomSourceCondition An environmental condition that gives all cells a source of random numbers on channel 1.
ReproductionCondition An environmental condition that permits cells to reproduce using I/O channels
